rects.text: Font Handling Issues Test Page

children.text: This page tests three font-related issues that were fixed in the Radiant layout engine.

rects.text: This page tests three font-related issues that were fixed in the Radiant layout engine.
Issue 1: TTC (TrueType Collection) Bold Font

children.text: This text should be rendered in Helvetica Bold (weight 700).

rects.text: This text should be rendered in Helvetica Bold (weight 700).

children.text: Tests: TTC font parsing - table offsets should be absolute, not relative.

rects.text: Tests: TTC font parsing - table offsets should be absolute, not relative.
Issue 2: Multi-Word Font Family Names

children.text: This text uses "Linux Libertine" or "Times New Roman" font family.

rects.text: This text uses "Linux Libertine" or "Times New Roman" font family.

children.text: Tests: CSS parser should combine IDENT tokens for unquoted multi-word font names.

rects.text: Tests: CSS parser should combine IDENT tokens for unquoted multi-word font names.
Issue 3: Font Family Fallback Resolution

computed.fontFamily: "NonExistent Font", "Another Fake Font", Georgia, Arial, sans-serif

children.text: This text should use Georgia (third in the fallback list), not the first unavailable font.

rects.text: This text should use Georgia (third in the fallback list), not the first unavailable font.

children.text: Tests: Font resolver should check availability and use first available font from the list.

rects.text: Tests: Font resolver should check availability and use first available font from the list.
Bonus: Modern RGB Color Syntax
This paragraph contains a

children.text: link with modern rgb() color syntax

rects.text: link with modern rgb() color syntax
using space-separated values.

children.text: Tests: color: rgb(8 145 178) should render as cyan/teal, not black.

rects.text: Tests: color: rgb(8 145 178) should render as cyan/teal, not black.
Expected Results
Issue 1:

children.text: Bold text should appear noticeably heavier than regular text

rects.text: Bold text should appear noticeably heavier than regular text
Issue 2:

children.text: Text should render in a serif font (Times New Roman or similar)

rects.text: Text should render in a serif font (Times New Roman or similar)
Issue 3:

children.text: Text should render in Georgia, not Arial

rects.text: Text should render in Georgia, not Arial
Bonus:

children.text: Links should appear in cyan/teal color (#0891b2)

rects.text: Links should appear in cyan/teal color (#0891b2)
